• The vaccine has been shown to be very

If you wish to discuss any of these questions in 
more detail please speak to a member of staff 
at the antenatal clinic or your GP .
For more information about the flu vaccine talk
to your GP , midwife, practice nurse, district 
nurse or pharmacist, or visit:
www.publichealth
